intro.title: Care Promise
intro.description: Our pieces are built to be serviced. Read how we handle returns, repairs, and aftercare globally.

policy.heading: Return Window
policy.text: Ready-to-ship pieces can be returned within 14 days of delivery in original condition. Made-to-order items are eligible for studio credit.

policy.heading: Warranty
policy.text: Lifetime polishing and structural repairs are included for sterling silver jewelry. Gold vermeil replating is complimentary for the first year.

policy.heading: Process
policy.text: Email care@nirakara.studio with your order number. We arrange insured pickup through DHL and share tracking for transparency.

help.title: Need Assistance?
help.text: The care team replies within 24 hours. Include close-up photos if you are requesting a repair so we can send an accurate estimate for turnaround time.
